item.title: Ronin the rat sets new landmine-sniffing record
item.description: Ronin, a giant African pouched rat, is the first rodent to uncover more than 100 mines in Cambodia.

item.title: Children among 14 dead in Russian attack on Ukrainian city, officials say
item.description: The head of the local defence council says a ballistic missile landed in the centre of a residential area.

item.title: Videos show aftermath of Israeli strike on school-turned-shelter in Gaza
item.description: BBC Verify explains what we know about the incident after reviewing videos that were posted online.

item.title: How the scale of Myanmar's loss is clearer one week after the quake
item.description: More than 3,000 people have been confirmed dead after last week's earthquake and the toll is expected to rise.

item.title: 'Don't speak, don't film': Journalist arrests fuel fears for democracy after Turkey protests
item.description: Yasin Akrul says his arrest was a warning to stop others taking pictures of the demonstrations in Turkey.
